reviews.text:
Had a menu that came to me in a pamphlet at the post delivers with the inserts of many other companies. I ordered the pizza and mentioned the coupon the three dollars off of anything $17.99, an employee named Mike gave me a hard time and accuse me of lying about the menu and even asked me to send him a text message with pictures in it. Reluctantly he gave in and completed the order and I gave a $5 tip for the delivery driver to have them put it on the credit card also. Total should have been about $23.99 or whatever.
Disgruntled with the employee named Mike who gave me a lot of flack for 20 minutes arguing, I want to talk to the store owner named Hany.
When I got there he "appeared" to be understanding said that his employees shouldn't have talked like that. I showed him the menu that I brought with me and he took it into his care and said for future reference this menu was not something we know about. Went home and the next day or two, noticed the credit card was charged $27.23.
In other words they never applied to coupon and I called the on her back and again for 20 minutes, tried to present the ethics of customer service to this guy and how $3 shouldn't I've been honored and the pizza delivered if there's something wrong with the communication or that I would agree or disagree with it, but they delivered it.
I had my credit card company flagged their companies fraud so no more charges can be placed. Told the credit card company there should be 23.99, not 27.23.
I'm perfectly happy to honor the charge of the $23.99 but not the overcharge price.

Nice little spot located in Dracut. The staff greet you with a hello and a warm smile. The environment is typical of a nice little pizza shop. They have all kinds of sales on all kinds of food. They had a wide variety of food on the menu that you could choose from. It was very impressive. We ordered pizza and fries. They had a good special called the "back to school deal." Maybe you should check it out. The food was delicious. The pizza was on point and very satisfying.

Couldn't ask for a better experience. Cheff salad was on point while the Haddock was fresh and fluffy, steak tips were done to perfection, chicken tenders had just the right amount of sauce and were soooo tender I could crush them with a spoon. Bacon and cheese tots were ü§§ü§§

They don't wear gloves when handling food, can't cook a simple sub as ordered, cooked my meat on grill too close to onions being cooked while using same spatula to flip my food causing onion taste onto my food üòï. Won't be back.
Food here is great. Today I got a mushroom, pepper, onion pizza. It was perfectly cooked and delicious.

editorial_summary.overview: Open since 1979, laid-back pizzeria also offers calzones, seafood & wings, plus trivia nights.

recentReviews.author: B B
recentReviews.text: They don't wear gloves when handling food, can't cook a simple sub as ordered, cooked my meat on grill too close to onions being cooked while using same spatula to flip my food causing onion taste onto my food üòï. Won't be back.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.4/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the wide variety of menu options, including specials like the "back to school deal," which enhances the dining experience with diverse choices. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this

The food quality is consistently praised, with items like the perfectly cooked mushroom, pepper, onion pizza and tender chicken tenders receiving high marks. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and welcoming staff create a warm atmosphere that customers appreciate, making them feel valued and at home. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative customer service experience and billing issues - review management can address this concern
Concerns about food handling and preparation - social media marketing can improve this area
Poor online visibility and potential competition issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews

recommendations.title: Improve Customer Satisfaction
recommendations.description: Address common issues mentioned in reviews
recommendations.impact: Boost overall rating and customer retention
